00022 #include "dfsch/lib/inet.h"
00023 
00024 #include <dfsch/strings.h>
00025 #include <dfsch/hash.h>
00026 #include <string.h>
00027 
00028 static dfsch_object_t* http_split_query(void* baton,
00029                                         dfsch_object_t* args,
00030                                         dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00031   char* pos;
00032   char* uri;
00033   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, uri);
00034   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00035 
00036   pos = strchr(uri, '?');
00037 
00038   if (!pos){
00039     return dfsch_list(1,
00040                       dfsch_make_string_cstr(uri));
00041   } else {
00042     return dfsch_list(2,
00043                       dfsch_make_string_buf(uri, pos-uri),
00044                       dfsch_make_string_cstr(pos+1));
00045   }
00046 }
00047 
00048 static dfsch_object_t* http_split_path(void* baton,
00049                                        dfsch_object_t* args,
00050                                        dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00051   char* path;
00052   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, path);
00053   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00054 
00055   return dfsch_http_split_path(path);
00056 }

00058 static dfsch_object_t* http_query_2_alist(void* baton,
00059                                           dfsch_object_t* args,
00060                                           dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00061   char* query;
00062   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, query);
00063   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00064 
00065   return dfsch_http_query_2_alist(query);
00066 }

00076 static dfsch_object_t* inet_urldecode(void* baton,
00077                                       dfsch_object_t* args,
00078                                       dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00079   dfsch_strbuf_t* str;
00080   DFSCH_BUFFER_ARG(args, str);
00081   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00082   
00083   return dfsch_make_string_nocopy(dfsch_inet_urldecode(str));
00084 }
00085 static dfsch_object_t* inet_urlencode(void* baton,

00087                                       dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){

00092   return dfsch_make_string_nocopy(dfsch_inet_urlencode(str));

00094 
00095 static dfsch_object_t* inet_base64_encode(void* baton,
00096                                       dfsch_object_t* args,
00097                                       dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00098   dfsch_strbuf_t* str;
00099   dfsch_object_t* wrap;
00100   dfsch_object_t* pad;
00101   DFSCH_BUFFER_ARG(args, str);
00102   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, wrap, NULL);
00103   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, pad, NULL);
00104   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00105   
00106   return dfsch_make_string_nocopy(dfsch_inet_base64_encode(str, 
00107                                                            wrap!=NULL, 
00108                                                            pad!=NULL));
00109 }
00110 static dfsch_object_t* inet_uri_base64_encode(void* baton,

00116   
00117   return dfsch_make_string_nocopy(dfsch_inet_uri_base64_encode(str));
00118 }

00151 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_module_inet_register(dfsch_object_t* env){
00152   dfsch_provide(env, "inet");
00153 
00154   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "http:split-query",
00155                     dfsch_make_primitive(http_split_query, NULL));
00156   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "http:split-path",
00157                     dfsch_make_primitive(http_split_path, NULL));
00158   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "http:query->alist",
00159                     dfsch_make_primitive(http_query_2_alist, NULL));
00160   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "http:query->hash",
00161                     dfsch_make_primitive(http_query_2_hash, NULL));
00162 
00163   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "inet:urldecode",
00164                     dfsch_make_primitive(inet_urldecode, NULL));
00165   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "inet:urlencode",
00166                     dfsch_make_primitive(inet_urlencode, NULL));
00167 
00168   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "inet:base64-encode",
00169                     dfsch_make_primitive(inet_base64_encode, NULL));
00170   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "inet:uri-base64-encode",
00171                     dfsch_make_primitive(inet_uri_base64_encode, NULL));
00172   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "inet:base64-decode",
00173                     dfsch_make_primitive(inet_base64_decode, NULL));
00174   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "inet:uri-base64-decode",
00175                     dfsch_make_primitive(inet_uri_base64_decode, NULL));
00176 
00177   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "inet:xml-escape",
00178                     dfsch_make_primitive(inet_xml_escape, NULL));
00179 
00180 }
